metadata.inclusion:
1. Open the cover by removing the bottom fixing screw
2. Insert the battery in the battery compartment
3. Press the Test Button 3 times within 1.5 seconds
4. Reattach the cover and tighten the fixing screw
metadata.exclusion: Press the Test Button 3 times within 1.5 seconds. The Water sensor will be removed from the Z-wave network.
metadata.reset: Press and hold the Test Button for 12 seconds.
